description:
John Doe and Exene Cervenka of the band X perform at The Current
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

John Doe and Exene Cervenka of the legendary Los Angeles rock band X perform three discography-spanning songs in The Current studio.

Songs Performed
00:00:00 Flipside
00:02:56 Because I Do 
00:05:34 In This House That I Call Home
Song 1 is from X’s 2024 album, "Smoke & Fiction"; song 2 is from X’s 1982 album, "Under The Big Black Sun"; and song 3 is from X’s 1981 album, "Wild Gift." These albums are available on @fat_possum Records, Elektra Records, and Slash Records, respectively.

Musicians
John Doe – guitar, vocals
Exene Cervenka – vocals

Credits
Guests – John Doe and Exene Cervenka of @XthebandLosAngeles 
Host – Jessica Paxton
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Audio Engineer – Evan Clark
Video Director – Eric Xu Romani
Camera Operators – Eric Xu Romani, D’Vir Rudin
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor

Subscribe to our channel:
http://www.youtube.
title: X – three-song performance at The Current
